channel.title: [Hyperion] How to find out the id's when you clicked on a button?

item.title: [Hyperion] How to find out the id's when you clicked on a button?
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Hello

I’m currently trying to make fletching 100%. Now I got the interface loaded, and that works fine, but whenever I click on the bow or on “make 5/10/X/all”, there is no id that is being printed out anywhere, so I don’t know where to start.

This is the code used to load the interface:

player.getActionSender().sendInterfaceModel(309, 2, 160, 841); player.getActionSender().sendString(309, (309 - 296), "What would you like to make?<br><br><br><br><br>" + ItemDefinition.forId(log.getItem()[1]).getName()); player.getActionSender().sendChatboxInterface(309); player.setInterfaceAttribute("fletching_log", log);
So how would I be able to find out which id is related to make 1/5/10/x/all so the player can actually make the bow?

Read full topic
item.source: [Hyperion] How to find out the id's when you clicked on a button?
